moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils module

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.create_vertex(vertex_type: type[BaseVertex], index: int, timestamp: int, value: Any) → BaseVertex[source]
moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.create_edge(pose_i: Pose, velocity_i: LinearVelocity, bias_i: ImuBias, pose_j: Pose, velocity_j: LinearVelocity, bias_j: ImuBias, measurements: list[Measurement], pim: PreintegratedCombinedMeasurements) → ImuOdometry[source]

Creates new edge of type ImuOdometry.

new edge.

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.compute_covariance(measurements: Iterable[Measurement]) → tuple[Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]]][source]

Computes the covariance of the accelerometer and gyroscope measurements [x,y,z]. If only one measurement is available, the default covariance is used.

Parameters:

measurements – IMU measurements.

Returns:

accelerometer and gyroscope noise covariance matrices.

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.set_parameters(params: PreintegrationCombinedParams, tf_base_sensor: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[4]], acc_cov: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], gyro_cov: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], integration_cov: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], bias_acc_cov: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], bias_omega_cov: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]]) → None[source]

Sets the parameters for the IMU measurements preintegration.

Parameters:

  • params – preintegration parameters.

  • tf_base_sensor – transformation matrix from base to sensor frame.

  • acc_cov – accelerometer noise covariance.

  • gyro_cov – gyroscope noise covariance.

  • integration_cov – integration noise covariance.

  • bias_acc_cov – accelerometer bias noise covariance.

  • bias_omega_cov – gyroscope bias noise covariance.

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.integrate(pim: PreintegratedCombinedMeasurements, measurements: OrderedSet[Measurement], timestamp: int, time_scale: float) → PreintegratedCombinedMeasurements[source]

Integrates the IMU measurements.

Parameters:

  • pim – gtsam preintegrated measurements.

  • measurements – IMU measurements.

  • timestamp – integration time limit.

  • time_scale – timescale factor.

Returns:

preintegrated IMU measurements.

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.get_vertices(storage: VertexStorage, timestamp: int, time_margin: int, index: int | None = None, default_values: tuple[tuple[tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float, float]], tuple[float, float, float], tuple[tuple[float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float]]] | None = None) → tuple[Pose, LinearVelocity, ImuBias, bool][source]

Gets the vertices from the storage or creates new ones.

Parameters:

  • storage – storage with vertices.

  • timestamp – timestamp.

  • time_margin – time margin.

  • index – indices of the vertices (optional).

  • default_values – default values for the vertices (optional).

Returns:

vertices and new index flag.

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.imu_preintegration.utils.create_missing_vertices(vertices: tuple[Pose | LinearVelocity | ImuBias | None, ...]) → tuple[Pose, LinearVelocity, ImuBias][source]

Creates missing vertices.

Parameters:

vertices – vertices to be checked.

Returns:

new vertices.
